title: Where's the blue essence?
body: I "participated" in league's old system of runes and rune pages yet every time I head to the loot tab trying to claim my rewards I get an "OK, Got It" and absolutely nothing happens. Are rune purchases going for be converted later? Has anyone had any luck?

replies.body: Play a game, you get an Blue Essence Orb you can use in the Hextech Loot screen.
im was have 17 PAGE runse all was with IP and i dont remember how many of other stuff like / AD . AP . / and all i got 50000 blue essence wt is that !!!!!!
I Don't get my blue  essences i did all what you told me but nothing happened please help me
You still need to play a matchmade game to complete the new missions to get the conversion started. After that, you'll be able to open the orbs it gives you to get all the essence.
